categories: Category:Learn to Read with Star Wars

nodes.text: Learn to Read with Star Wars: Yoda Level 3

Learn to Read with Star Wars: Yoda Level 3 is a box set collecting four Level 3 young-readers titles in the DK Readers series. The collected books include Star Wars: Feel the Force! (Benjamin Harper), Finn's Mission (David Fentiman), Star Wars: I Want to Be a Jedi (Simon Beecroft), and Star Wars: Rebel Heroes (Shari Last). It was published by DK Publishing on December 12, 2017, and was available exclusively through retailer Barnes & Noble.
